mergearticles: Special page name for the [[Special:MergeArticles]] special page
mergearticles-target-new-label:
Short info text when a new page is created with the current action.
{{Identical|New page}}
mergearticles-page-item-action-compare:
Label for process dialog action "compare".
{{Identical|Compare & Merge}}
mergearticles-page-item-action-review:
Label for process dialog action "review".
{{Identical|Review & Merge}}
mergearticles-no-pages-available: Info text in merge overview, when there is currently no pages, that should be merged.
mergearticles-action-unknown:
Error message, when the selected action is unknown to the system.
{{Identical|Unknown action}}
mergearticles-request-invalid:
Error message, when the merge request to the API with given data was invalid
{{Identical|Invalid request}}
mergearticles-sp-review: Special page heading for the [[Special:MergeArticles]] special page in "review" mode.
mergearticles-sp-compare: Special page heading for the [[Special:MergeArticles]] special page in "compare" mode.
mergearticles-do-merge-label:
Label for the button, that starts the merge process.
{{Identical|Merge}}
mergearticles-merge-success-header: Heading for when the merge process for the page was successful
mergearticles-merge-fail-header: Heading for when the merge process has failed
mergearticles-back-to-overview: Label for button, that sends the user back to the overview page
mergearticles-merge-new-help:
Help message for when the target page does not exist yet. The user should be informed, that the user is able to check and modify the content before merge.
* $1 - Name of the Page, the content will be merged into
mergearticles-merge-existing-help:
Help message for when the target page does exist. The user should be informed, that the user should compare the changes below.
* $1 - Name of the target page
mergearticles-diff-action-accept:
Label for the button, that approves the changes.
{{Identical|Approve}}
mergearticles-diff-action-refuse:
Label for the button, that rejects the changes.
{{Identical|Reject}}
mergearticles-diff-accepted:
Status label on the outcome when the merge was approved.
{{Identical|Approved}}
mergearticles-diff-refused:
Status label on the outcome when the merge was rejected.
{{Identical|Rejected}}
mergearticles-diff-header: Headline for section, that shows the changes in the text
mergearticles-resolution-counter:
Info text, that showes how many merge sections have been resolved
* $1 - Total number of sections
* $2 - Number of sections already resolved
mergearticles-same-block-label: Info text that shows how many identical blocks have been hidden. Use PLURAL.
mergearticles-diff-option-hide-identical:
Label for button that hides identical blocks.
{{Identical|Hide identical blocks}}
mergearticles-diff-option-accept-all-lab:
Label for button that approves all changes.
{{Identical|Approve all}}
mergearticles-diff-item-undo:
Label for button, that undos the changes.
{{Identical|Undo}}
mergearticles-show-final-text-button-lab:
Label for button that showes the final merged text.
{{Identical|Show final text}}
mergearticles-show-final-text-label: Info text when all merge conflicts were resolved and the final text can now be viewed and, if needed, corrected before merge. The user should get a notice here, that after this point, merge conflict cannot be modified anymore!
mergearticles-final-text-header-label: Label for the section that shows the final merged text.
mergearticles-final-text-header-note: Small note, that the text can be modified
mergearticles-discard-draft: Label for the button that discards the draft
mergearticles-discard-draft-help: Help text for the button, that discards the draft. The user should be asked, if the user really wants to proceed
mergearticles-no-diff-message: Info text when there is no difference in the text between the draft and the target page
mergearticles-draft-discard-fail-header: Error message, when the draft cannot be discarded
mergearticles-draft-discard-success-head: Short heading, when the draft was discarded
mergearticles-draft-discard-success-text:
Info message when the changes for the page was discarded successfully.
* $1 - Name of the page, the changes have been discarded for
mergearticles-file-origin-header: Heading for the draft version of the file. This headline should also state, that this is the new version.
mergearticles-file-target-header: Heading for the target version of the file. This headline should also state, that this is the old version.
mergearticles-no-content-message: Info text, when there is no content on the page. The user should be informed, that content can be added below
mergearticles-review-header:
Heading for the pages new text
{{Identical|New page text}}
mergearticles-no-diff-file-message: Info text, when the source file is identical to the target file
mergearticles-diff-action-refuse-both:
Label for button, that removes both (removed section and new section)
{{Identical|Reject both}}
mergearticles-diff-action-accept-both:
Label for button, that keeps both (removed section and new section)
{{Identical|Accept both}}
mergearticles-diff-accepted-both: Info text when both (removed section and new section) have been kept
mergearticles-diff-refused-both: Info text when both (removed section and new section) have been removed
mergearticles-term-filter-label: Label for the client-side filter for page name
